## fogExp2 variable

Similar to `fogExp()`<!-- -->. Computes exponential fog factor \[0..1\], based on given fully saturated fog distance and density. Uses `exp2()` internally.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
fogExp2: import("@thi.ng/shader-ast").TaggedFn2<"float", "float", "float">
```
